description: A Kotlin singleton object acting as an in-memory repository for media data, providing categorized media items, background URLs, and search functionalities for a cinematic TV interface app.

classes.name: SampleRepository
classes.description: An object providing static media data for the application, including categories, media items, background URLs, and search capabilities.

classes.name: UrlItem
classes.description: A data class representing individual media items with associated metadata and image URLs.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: A data class (implied by usage) grouping media items under a category name (not explicitly defined in the provided snippet).

classes.name: MediaItem
classes.description: A data class (implied by usage) representing media content with properties like id, title, overview, category, images, year, and rating.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: Returns a list of all media categories with their items.

methods.name: recommended
methods.description: Returns a list of recommended media items.

methods.name: topPicks
methods.description: Returns a list of top pick media items.

methods.name: recentlyAdded
methods.description: Returns a list of recently added media items.

methods.name: bannerBackgrounds
methods.description: Returns a list of URLs for banner background images.

methods.name: byId
methods.description: Fetches a media item by its unique ID.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a case-insensitive search across media titles and overviews.

methods.name: toMediaItem
methods.description: Converts a UrlItem to a MediaItem, filling in resource identifiers and metadata.
